## QUB on-campus accommodation


If you require accommodation for the conference, **we suggest booking at Queen's University Belfast on-campus accommodation**. Accommodation is offered on a first-come first-serve basis in the QUB Elms Village.  

Price: **£57.50 + VAT for 1 single bedroom with en suite bathroom, per room per night**.

If you have any questions, please contact the Accommodations team directly on +44 28 9097 4403 or [allocations@qub.ac.uk](mailto:allocations@qub.ac.uk). Rooms can be booked on the ISRE2024 registration website at [https://ecommerce.apps.qub.ac.uk/osisre/catalog/index.php](https://ecommerce.apps.qub.ac.uk/osisre/catalog/index.php).

Below are some hotels in Belfast who offered **reductions for ISRE2024 attendees**. Please **contact them directly** and **give the group reference "International Society for Research on Emotion"** before making your booking.
